title: Build Template Testing Framework
description: Develop scripts/test-templates.py for automated testing of template generation and detection. Include tests for template scoring, file generation, and cross-references. Must test task breakdown scenarios and subtask creation.
notes: Test cases for: template detection accuracy, file generation completeness, cross-reference validity, phase 0 triggering, task breakdown workflows. CI/CD integration via GitHub Actions.
decision_rationale: Testing framework ensures reliability as templates evolve. Regression prevention is critical for maintaining quality.
